General.Name: Zhejiang Zoenn Design Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Zoenn Design Co., Ltd. provides supply chain integration services in China. It is also involved in the retail and wholesale of shoes, hats, and clothing products; sale of raw and auxiliary materials for shoemaking; sale of leather products, needle textiles and raw materials, and plastic products; retail and wholesale of stationery; and import and export of goods and technology. In addition, the company provides professional design, industrial design, graphic design services; and technical, technical development and consultation, technical exchange, and technology transfer and promotion services. Further, it manufactures and sells shoes and leather goods. Zhejiang Zoenn Design Co., Ltd. was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Wenzhou, China.
